> <OLD>
>
> "We cant stay here without do nothing while our friends are in danger"said
> annoyed Windlord

There was a small nod from LORD ELDER as he looked at WINDLORD and
then PERCEPTOR. "You may be correct." ELDER said in tones that
indicated his fatigue.

"But what can we do?" LORD ELDER said as gestured at the view screen.
"They are in the Antarctic and they took the shuttle we have. If I
sent you after them, they would probably be finished and returned
before you got there."

(TAG)

- Preston
